verbs.description: [V: slow] [ARG1: cooker] turkey pesto lasagna my cheesy noodle - y lasagna makes any slow - cooker skeptic a believer it easy to prep while my kids nap and dinner ready when their dad walks in the door at night we bring more pesto and marinara to the table for our resident sauce lovers —blair lonergan rochelle va turkey
